TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerAutoFormatCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerAutoFormatCollection Implements IList
public ref class DesignerAutoFormatCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type DesignerAutoFormatCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表控制項設計工具中的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和任何衍生的類別定義屬性設為物件。The class and any derived class defines the property as a object. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫衍生的控制項設計工具中的屬性加入自訂的自動格式化樣式，並返回視覺化設計工具中的支援格式的集合。Control developers can override the property in a derived control designer, add custom automatic formatting styles, and return the collection of supported formats to the visual designer. 加入物件時，以動態方式增加集合。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 這個集合中的索引都是以零為起始的。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用屬性來判斷多少的自動套用樣式格式位於集合中。Use the property to determine how many automatic style formats are in the collection. 此外，使用方法和屬性，以提供下列功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 加入至集合的單一格式的方法。The method to add a single format to the collection. - 方法來加入集合中的特定索引處的一種格式。The method to add a format at a particular index within the collection. - 方法來移除格式。The method to remove a format. - 方法移除特定索引處的格式。The method to remove the format at a particular index. - 方法，以判斷是否包含特定的格式已存在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular format is already in the collection. - 方法來擷取集合中的格式的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a format within the collection. - 屬性來取得或設定特定的索引，並使用陣列標記法的格式。The property to get or set the format at a particular index, using array notation. - 要從集合移除所有格式的方法。The method to remove all formats from the collection. - 屬性來判斷數字集合中的格式。The property to determine the number of formats in the collection. - 方法來取得集合中的格式的位置。The method to get the position of a format within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂控制項設計工具中的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a custom control designer. 衍生的控制項設計工具會實作加上三個自訂的自動格式衍生自執行個體的屬性類別。The derived control designer implements the property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the class. [!code-csharp[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/CS/DesignerAutoFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/VB/DesignerAutoFormat.vb#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來決定上限索引時逐一查看集合中的物件。The property typically is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為位於索引`0`中的索引處的最後一個元素，而且`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將集合中特定索引位置處的物件。The method adds a object to the collection at a specific index location. 若要新增單一集合的結尾，以使用方法。To add a single to the end of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您將項目插入集合時，後續項目集合中的索引值將會變更。When you insert an item into a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要擷取索引子集合內，或將格式設定在集合中的指定索引處的指定索引處的物件。Use the indexer to retrieve the object at the specified index within the collection or to set the format at the specified index within the collection. 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，您可以在此索引中的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`AutoFormats(i)`的 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`AutoFormats[i]`適用於 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `AutoFormats(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `AutoFormats[i]` for C#. 當您擁有的參考物件，並需要收集、 使用中物件的索引方法。When you have a reference to the object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

summary.span: 取得控制項在執行階段顯示時的最大外部維度數目。

span.span: Gets the maximum outer dimensions of the control as it will appear at run time.

value.span: 結構，包含設計介面上控制項的高度和寬度。

span.span: A structure that contains the height and width of the control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會檢查每個集合中的格式，並傳回最大高度和中的最大寬度結構。The property examines each format in the collection and returns the largest height and the largest width in a structure. 視覺效果設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用來判斷的初始大小**AutoFormat** 對話方塊。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the to determine the initial size of the **AutoFormat** dialog box. 大小下限會是 200-200 像素為單位。The minimum size is 200-by-200 pixels.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat format) cil managed

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除第一個出現`format`從集合。The method removes the first occurrence of `format` from the collection. 如果物件不包含`format`，集合會保持不變。If the object does not contain `format`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 方法會判斷使用的相等方法進行比較的物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects that are being compared. 方法會執行線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成正比值。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value. 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的格式，使用方法。To remove a format at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有格式，使用方法。To remove all formats from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，集合中的後續項目的索引值將會變更。When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不本質上是安全執行緒程序透過集合列舉。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 這在列舉期間造成例外狀況。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 使用中鎖定集合以確保執行緒安全性在整個列舉期間的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the entire enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 如需鎖定集合具備執行緒安全存取的詳細資訊，請參閱。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

summary.span: 在 物件轉換為 介面時，移除指定索引處的項目。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified index when the object is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
